revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = NVIDIA Jetson TK1 development kit |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://developer.nvidia.com/embedded/buy/jetson-devkit |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = nVIDIA |model = Jetson |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = TK1 Development Board |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = nVIDIA;Tegra K1;T124, CD570M; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1threads = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1spd = 2.3 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDIN8DE4-16G; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q32FWSIG; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TC4G63CFR-RDA; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8211GS; |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:04:4B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2014.10;; |stockos = Linux;3.10.24;Ubuntu 14.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (Female Micro-B), USB 3.0, Mini PCIe, SATA, SD Card slot, HDMI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes, yes, (DB9), (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes, 20-pin header, populated,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, HDMI, Audio in (3.5mm), Audio out (3.5 mm), MIPI CSI, LVDS, I2C, GPIO, |addchip = Audio codec;Realtek;ALC5639;;1;,,, Notebook System Power Controller;TI;TPS51220A;;1;,,, Programmable PMU;AMS;AS3722;;1;,,, 3-V to 5.5-V Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver and Receiver;TI;TRS3232E;;1;,,, 1A Ultra Low dropout linear regulator;Anpec;APL5910;;1;,,, Single Channel USB Power Switch;TI;TPS2065;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = ubuntu |defaultpass = ubuntu |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2014 |estprice = 192 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00L7AWOEC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 'PM375 DEV KIT', 'PCB:180-7R375-1002-D00', 'nVIDIA' and 'TEGRA K1' are silkscreened on the board.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[nVIDIA]] Tegra K1 @2.3GHz 32-bit Quad-Core (ARM Cortex-A15) :GPU: [[nVIDIA] Kepler "GK20a" GPU with 192 SM3.2 CUDA cores * RAM: 2GB DDR3L @933MHz * Flash: 16GB eMMC 4.51, 4MB SPI
==Links of Interest== *[https://elinux.org/Jetson_TK1 ''Jetson TK1'' on '''Embedded Linux Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/03/26/192-nvidia-jetson-tk1-development-board-with-tegra-k1-quad-core-cortex-a15-soc/ ''$192 Nvidia Jetson TK1 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=nvidia_jetson_tk1&num=1 ''Trying Out The Jetson TK1'' on '''phoronix''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
